data.title: Join Or Die With Craig Ferguson
data.meta_description: Join or Die with Craig Ferguson features the comedian debating provocative and timely topics in his unorthodox and iconoclastic manner. Each episode features
data.text:
Join or Die with Craig Ferguson features the comedian debating provocative and timely topics in his unorthodox and iconoclastic manner. Each episode features a panel of guests which will include celebrities, comedians and experts, as well as the American public through social media. Topics will include: biggest presidential campaign flop, greatest founding father and which invention was historyâ€™s greatest game-changer.

Stay up-to-date with the latest news and updates from Comedy Dynamics by subscribing to our newsletter. Be the first to know about our upcoming shows, behind-the-scenes content, and exclusive promotions. Don't miss out on the magic of storytelling.
